# #Create DataFrame for the stbooking TMSLMS combine Table
# stbooking = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stbooking.parquet', format='parquet')
# stbooking.createOrReplaceTempView("stbooking")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stinstruction_tms
AS
SELECT 
    i.id as tms_instruction_id
    ,i.bookingid as tms_instruction_bookingid
    ,i.addressid as tms_instruction_addressid
    ,i.instrtype as tms_instruction_instrtype
    ,i.onroute as tms_instruction_onroute
    ,i.onrouteid as tms_instruction_onrouteid
    ,i.sort as tms_instruction_sort
    ,i.onroutestatus as tms_instruction_onroutestatus
    ,i.note as tms_instruction_note
    ,i.citybranchid as tms_instruction_citybranchid
    ,i.citybranchname as tms_instruction_citybranchname
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.insdate) as tms_instruction_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.moddate) as tms_instruction_moddate
    ,i.insby as tms_instruction_insby
    ,CASE 
        WHEN i.instrtype = "pickup" THEN tms_booking_pickupdate
        WHEN i.instrtype = "delivery" THEN tms_booking_deliverydate
    END as tms_instruction_bookingpickupdeliverydate
    ,CASE 
        WHEN i.duedate < 0 THEN NULL 
        ELSE to_timestamp(7200+i.duedate) 
    END as tms_instruction_duedate
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.actualdate) as tms_instruction_actualdate


FROM publicinstruction i
LEFT JOIN stbooking b on b.tms_booking_id = i.bookingid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stinstruction_lms 
AS

SELECT    
    CAST(CONCAT('-',CAST(i.id as string)) as int) as tms_instruction_id
    ,CAST(CONCAT('-',CAST(i.bookingid as string)) as int) as tms_instruction_bookingid
    ,CAST(CONCAT('-',CAST(i.addressid as string)) as int) as tms_instruction_addressid
    ,CASE
        WHEN i.instructiontypeid = 1 THEN 'pickup'
        ELSE 'delivery'    
    END as tms_instruction_instrtype
    ,null as tms_instruction_onroute
    ,null as tms_instruction_onrouteid
    ,i.sequence as tms_instruction_sort
    ,null as tms_instruction_onroutestatus
    ,null as tms_instruction_note
    ,null as tms_instruction_citybranchid
    ,null as tms_instruction_citybranchname
    ,i.createddate as tms_instruction_insdate
    ,i.createddate as tms_instruction_moddate
    ,CAST(CONCAT('-',CAST(i.userid as string)) as int) as tms_instruction_insby
    ,CASE 
        WHEN i.instructiontypeid = 1 THEN tms_booking_pickupdate
        ELSE tms_booking_deliverydate
    END as tms_instruction_bookingpickupdeliverydate

FROM dbolhinstruction i
LEFT JOIN stbooking b on b.tms_booking_id = CAST(CONCAT('-',CAST(i.bookingid as string)) as int)

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stinstruction_tmp2
AS
SELECT 
    si.tms_instruction_id
    ,si.tms_instruction_bookingid
    ,si.tms_instruction_addressid
    ,si.tms_instruction_instrtype
    ,si.tms_instruction_onroute
    ,si.tms_instruction_onrouteid
    ,si.tms_instruction_sort
    ,si.tms_instruction_onroutestatus
    ,si.tms_instruction_note
    ,si.tms_instruction_citybranchid
    ,si.tms_instruction_citybranchname
    ,si.tms_instruction_insdate
    ,si.tms_instruction_moddate
    ,si.tms_instruction_insby
    ,si.tms_instruction_duedate
    ,si.tms_instruction_actualdate
    ,to_timestamp(si.tms_instruction_bookingpickupdeliverydate) as tms_instruction_bookingpickupdeliverydate
    ,i.id as orv_lhdelivery_id
    ,i.did as orv_lhdelivery_did
    ,i.lat as orv_lhdelivery_lat
    ,i.lng as orv_lhdelivery_lng
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.actualeta) as orv_lhdelivery_actualeta
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.eta) as orv_lhdelivery_eta
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsgeofenceenter) as orv_lhdelivery_tsgeofenceenter
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsdocuments) as orv_lhdelivery_tsdocuments
    ,i.customerref1 as orv_lhdelivery_customerref1
    ,i.customerref2 as orv_lhdelivery_customerref2
    ,i.trailersize as orv_lhdelivery_trailersize
    ,i.cargoweight as orv_lhdelivery_cargoweight
    ,i.cubicvolume as orv_lhdelivery_cubicvolume
    ,i.geocodingstatus as orv_lhdelivery_geocodingstatus
    ,i.status as orv_lhdelivery_status
    ,i.optimizedorder as orv_lhdelivery_optimizedorder
    ,i.triporder as orv_lhdelivery_triporder
    ,i.sequence as orv_lhdelivery_sequence
    ,i.bookingid as orv_lhdelivery_bookingid
    ,i.grv as orv_lhdelivery_grv
    ,i.chepslip as orv_lhdelivery_chepslip
    ,i.type as orv_lhdelivery_type
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.insdate) as orv_lhdelivery_insdate
    ,i.isdirect as orv_lhdelivery_isdirect
    ,i.notes as orv_lhdelivery_notes
    ,i.contactperson as orv_lhdelivery_contactperson
    ,i.contactnumber as orv_lhdelivery_contactnumber
    ,i.trailerfleetcode as orv_lhdelivery_trailerfleetcode
    ,i.primarycustomerid as orv_lhdelivery_primarycustomerid
    ,i.pcustomername as orv_lhdelivery_pcustomername
    ,i.pcustomeraccountnumber as orv_lhdelivery_pcustomeraccountnumber
    ,i.pcustomerrevenuecode as orv_lhdelivery_pcustomerrevenuecode
    ,i.secondarycustomerid as orv_lhdelivery_secondarycustomerid
    ,i.scustomername as orv_lhdelivery_scustomername
    ,i.scustomeraccountnumber as orv_lhdelivery_scustomeraccountnumber
    ,i.scustomerrevenuecode as orv_lhdelivery_scustomerrevenuecode
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.actiondate) as orv_lhdelivery_actiondate
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsgeofenceexit) as orv_lhdelivery_tsgeofenceexit
    ,i.pctmsid as orv_lhdelivery_pctmsid
    ,i.sctmsid as orv_lhdelivery_sctmsid
    ,i.customorder as orv_lhdelivery_customorder
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.skipdate) as orv_lhdelivery_skipdate
    ,i.skipreason as orv_lhdelivery_skipreason
    ,i.outofgeofencereason as orv_lhdelivery_outofgeofencereason
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsarrivedcustomer) as orv_lhdelivery_tsarrivedcustomer
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsdroppedoff) as orv_lhdelivery_tsdroppedoff
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsstartoffloading) as orv_lhdelivery_tsstartoffloading
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsstartloading) as orv_lhdelivery_tsstartloading
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsloaded) as orv_lhdelivery_tsloaded
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsfinishedoffloading) as orv_lhdelivery_tsfinishedoffloading
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsdocumnetshanddovedriver) as orv_lhdelivery_tsdocumnetshanddovedriver
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsleavingcustomer) as orv_lhdelivery_tsleavingcustomer
    ,i.actionsubtype as orv_lhdelivery_actionsubtype
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsstart) as orv_lhdelivery_tsstart
    ,i.signame as orv_lhdelivery_signame
    ,i.signcomment as orv_lhdelivery_signcomment
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.signdate) as orv_lhdelivery_signdate
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsendtate) as orv_lhdelivery_tsendtate
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsentergeofenceapp) as orv_lhdelivery_tsentergeofenceapp
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.tsexitgeofenceapp) as orv_lhdelivery_tsexitgeofenceapp
    ,i.tmsid as orv_lhdelivery_tmsid
    ,i.subtype as orv_lhdelivery_subtype
    ,i.needbotrailerver as orv_lhdelivery_needbotrailerver
    ,i.secondtrailerfleetcode as orv_lhdelivery_secondtrailerfleetcode
    ,i.trailerverlat as orv_lhdelivery_trailerverlat
    ,i.trailerverlng as orv_lhdelivery_trailerverlng
    ,i.tstrailerver as orv_lhdelivery_tstrailerver
    ,i.podlat as orv_lhdelivery_podlat
    ,i.podlng as orv_lhdelivery_podlng
    ,i.skiplat as orv_lhdelivery_skiplat
    ,i.skiplng as orv_lhdelivery_skiplng
    ,to_timestamp(7200+i.uncanceldate) as orv_lhdelivery_uncanceldate
    --,i.citybranchname as orv_lhdelivery_citybranchname

FROM stinstruction_tmp si
LEFT JOIN publiclhinstruction i on i.tmsid = si.tms_instruction_id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stinstruction
AS
SELECT 
*
,(to_unix_timestamp(orv_lhdelivery_tsleavingcustomer)-to_unix_timestamp(orv_lhdelivery_tsarrivedcustomer)) as tms_instruction_inputpickupduration
,(to_unix_timestamp(orv_lhdelivery_tsloaded)-to_unix_timestamp(orv_lhdelivery_tsstartloading)) as tms_instruction_loadingduration
,(to_unix_timestamp(orv_lhdelivery_tsgeofenceexit)-to_unix_timestamp(orv_lhdelivery_tsgeofenceenter)) as tms_instruction_geopickupduration
,(to_unix_timestamp(orv_lhdelivery_tsendtate)-to_unix_timestamp(tms_instruction_insdate)) as tms_instruction_actionpickupduration
,CASE 
    WHEN orv_lhdelivery_tsarrivedcustomer is null THEN 'unknown'
    WHEN orv_lhdelivery_tsarrivedcustomer < tms_instruction_bookingpickupdeliverydate THEN 'inservice'
    ELSE 'outofservice'
END tms_instruction_driverinputservice        
,CASE
    WHEN orv_lhdelivery_tsentergeofenceapp is null THEN 'unknown'
    WHEN orv_lhdelivery_tsentergeofenceapp < tms_instruction_bookingpickupdeliverydate THEN 'inservice'
    ELSE 'outofservice'   
END tms_instruction_geofenceservice

FROM stinstruction_tmp2
